name: Blindfold: Chapter 1
description:
Hello! I've been a game dev for a few years now but I've never published anything. I figured since I'm currently working on chapter 2 of this game I'd release the first one as my first game on the market! :) Hope you like it!

Story:

Dive into PRS (Personality Replication Software) playing as Greenburg Lab's leading AI advancement, Ed! The purpose of your life may be meaningless and null but maybe you could decide on something to do with it. Are you a machine or a human with a wiped memory?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

F - Interact

E - Pickup/Drop
